title: Incident Fixer Dashboard
oneLiner: Real-time dashboard that cut incident reaction time by 41%.
problem: Ops team had fragmented monitoring tools and missed SLA windows during alerts.
solution: Built a single dashboard with live event streams, severity filters, and smart on-call routing.
result: Average MTTR dropped from 49 minutes to 29 minutes in the first month.

title: CI Guardian Bot
oneLiner: A bot that explains failed pipelines and proposes auto-fixes.
problem: Developers lost time triaging flaky tests and noisy CI logs.
solution: Implemented a parser for CI logs with issue clustering and bot comments in pull requests.
result: Pipeline debugging time reduced by 33% and flaky test count halved.

title: Field CRM Mobile
oneLiner: Offline-first CRM app for sales teams on the road.
problem: Field reps could not update client data without stable internet.
solution: Built an offline queue with conflict resolution and background sync.
result: Daily active usage increased by 54% and duplicate records dropped by 70%.

title: Feature Flag Hub
oneLiner: Safe rollout platform with instant rollback controls.
problem: Releases required full deploys and risked large production failures.
solution: Designed a feature-flag console with audit logs and phased audience targeting.
result: Release frequency doubled while critical rollout incidents dropped near zero.
